name: Ayman Ayoub
text: David and Anna are awesome, not only very courteous, but also David was super cautious in applying covid related measures I touching and serving the food, as well as making sure other colleagues washed their hands regularly and when accidently touching their faces. Awesome, keep it up guys.

name: Angie Cruz
text: The lasagne was HUGE and delicious. Servers were very fast and friendly. I was also given an option to make it a combo with salad and garlic knots for added value. Combo Drink was small but refillable.

name: Gus Chavez
text: Great service and no pushy upselling. Very friendly staff. Dave was very helpful when helping me out.

name: Miguel Macias
text: If you‚Äôre ever at the Cabazon Outlets, make sure you treat yourself with delicious pizza. This place has awesome staff, and a great environment overall!

name: kiara mata
text: finished shopping and i was going to end my day wit a pizza, fresh out the oven!! sooo good !! so friendly !! love their customer service ((: highly recommend!!!!!

text: It was a horrible experience...an old lady was on a phone during I was ready to pay she make me wait to take my money....ü§Æü§Æü§Æü§ÆThis happend on Friday Nov 13 2020 around 5pm

name: Alex E Kavanaugh
text: Excellent! 2 big slices and soda for 10.99

name: Fisher Keene
text: Pizza had hair inside the dough and they refused to refund the pizza. Stating it is against their policies. As well as the meatball had rock little items inside. Terrible customer service. Terrible food.

name: Emma Degroutte
text: Love the pizza and pasta combo here! The best white Mac n cheese üëå comes with a garlic bread as well. Friendly staff
